user.title: Set up Fade Lights
user.description: This integration provides smooth light fading and automatic brightness adjustment for dimmed lights.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

init.title: Configure fade lights
init.description: Customize how lights fade and adjust their brightness automatically.

data_description.default_brightness_pct: When using the fade_lights service without specifying brightness, fade lights to this brightness level (0-100%).
data_description.default_transition: When using the fade_lights service without specifying transition time, take this many seconds to fade (0-3600 seconds).
data_description.auto_brightness_threshold: When you turn on a light below this brightness level (0-100%), automatically boost it to your preferred brightness.
data_description.auto_brightness_target: When auto-brightness triggers, set lights to this brightness level (0-100%).

fade_lights.name: Fade lights
fade_lights.description: Fades lights to a desired level over a specified transition period.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity ID of a light or light group.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness percentage
brightness_pct.description: Integer value from 0 to 100 representing the desired final brightness level as a percentage.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Transition time for fading indicated in HH:MM:SS, MM:SS, or SS format (e.g., 00:05:30 or 5).

force.name: Force
force.description: Set to true to force changing the brightness even if it has been changed manually.
